character.age: 25 years old, with a youthful appearance and vigor of someone half his age due to advanced magical enhancements.
character.role: Main protagonist, a skilled paladin and champion of justice.
character.background: Born in the kingdom of Everia, Eryndor was trained by the Order of the White Rose from a young age. He demonstrated exceptional martial prowess and unwavering dedication to his cause, earning him recognition as one of the most promising knights of his generation.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Blue with a golden fleck in the left iris, signifying his magical affinity.
physical-appearance.hair-color: Brown, often worn in a short, neat beard and styled in a manner reminiscent of ancient paladins.
